title: The first Dirichlet eigenvalue and the width
abstract:
For a geodesic ball with non-negative Ricci curvature and mean convex
boundary, it is known that the first Dirichlet eigenvalue of this geodesic ball
has a sharp lower bound in term of its radius. We show a quantitative explicit
inequality, which bounds the width of geodesic ball in terms of the spectral
gap between the first Dirichlet eigenvalue and the corresponding sharp lower
bound.
